name: Forks and Porks
description:
Keep your pigs safe while they grow. Once they're big enough they will be able to fly away with their secret power (I'm not disclosing where that comes from but you can guess by the puffs!).
Don't let the evil forks-equipped villains get to them!

Use the mouse to target the villains and left click on them to get them out of the way.

Please rate the game on the compo site of Ludum Dare! :)

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=48604
